mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (notice_title, notice_content, notice_type, user_id) VALUES (#{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeType}, #{userId})
mapper.delete: UPDATE notice SET notice_status = 'deleted' WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user u LEFT JOIN notice n ON u.user_id = n.user_id WHERE n.notice_id = #{noticeId}
